dt-option.name: searchPanes.orderable
dt-option.summary: Hide the ordering buttons in all panes

type.description: By setting the `-init searchPanes.orderable` option to `false` the ordering buttons will be hidden in all of the panes.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.orderable` paramater is `true`, meaning that as standard the ordering buttons will be included in the panes.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchPanes will be displayed with the ordering buttons included in the interface. However if the value of `-init searchPanes.orderable` is set to 'false' then the ordering buttons will no longer be displayed in any of the panes.
The ordering buttons can be hidden for individual panes by the `-init columns.searchPanes.orderable` option.

example.title: Hide ordering buttons for all panes
